PABX Price in Bangladesh @ 20,000 Taka

A PABX is a Private Automatic Branch Exchange. It is a telephone system that allows businesses to have their phone system and also be able to call outside numbers. PABX is a private branch exchange connecting lines from different locations or companies through one central switchboard. PABX can also be used for intercom purposes, where employees can communicate without using the main switchboard. PABX is typically installed in an office or company, and it allows the users to make voice calls through their office phones and receive calls on their desk phones. A PABX also provides call forwarding, call parking, voicemail, and other features generally not available with ordinary telephones. A PABX allows users to make and receive calls over a single telephone line, which is shared by all users on the same network and can be configured as either analog or digital lines using an analog switch.

Call Now: 01973009007
Order Now

5 Benefits of Using PABX

Managing all incoming calls is becoming extremely difficult with an ever-increasing number of devices and users. A PABX is a phone system with multiple lines to answer and screen calls.

  • PABX helps you avoid wasting time on unwanted calls.
  • PABX allows you to screen your callers before they get through to your phone.
  • PABX makes it easier for you to keep track of incoming calls.
  • PABX can help you identify the caller’s location before allowing them through the system.
  • You can use a voice-recognition system with your PABX.

Essential Benefits of Installing a PABX in Your Office

Voice-to-voice communication: With the PABX, you can make and receive calls from anywhere in the world without any restrictions or limitations. You can also make conference calls with other people and have them connected to your line without having to worry about the quality of service or bandwidth issues.

Centralized phone system: The centralization of all phone lines on one device helps reduce the number of phones that need to be purchased and maintained by your company, which saves money and time on an ongoing basis.

Reduced cost:  You save money on an item because you are not purchasing multiple devices.

Key Features of a Modern PABX System

  • Effortless call transferring
  • Constant connectivity that is not dependent on any particular phone service provider
  • Using VoIP to ensure the highest possible call quality
  • Customizable according to your company’s requirements

Some Advanced Features of The Modern PABX System

  • Auto Attendant
  • Call Recording
  • Conference Call
  • Voicemail
  • Call waiting

IKE PABX SYSTEM

IKE is a leading manufacturer of intercom and PABX in Bangladesh. The company was started over twenty years. IKE is an affordable and easy-to-use communication tool used in homes, offices, or outdoors. It is lightweight, portable, and has long battery life. It also has an attractive design that makes it ideal for use at home or office. IKE is a mobile intercom system that lets you communicate with your family, friends, colleagues, and guests. It has various features that make it stand out from other intercom systems. PABX Panasonic System

Panasonic PABX is a high-end intercom system used in offices, homes, and hotels. It offers the best solution for a range of needs and requirements. Panasonic PABX is an advanced intercom system that offers the best solution for various needs and requirements. It has 4-way conference calling with up to 4 participants, 2-way conferencing with up to 3 participants, speakerphone with speaker volume control, HD audio quality, and more. The ability to grow your communication system in the best way for you. With Panasonic, you’re able to easily transition between simple analog systems and advanced IP-based Network Communication Platforms capable of handling multiple locations both locally or across the globe – depending on what best meets your requirements at any given time. Furthermore, because of the built-in mobility features that make it simple for employees to stay in touch wherever they are working, there is no need for expensive mobile phone contracts to be purchased. Panasonic PABX systems are perfect for combining traditional office telephone usage with IP technology.

Understanding PABX Price in Bangladesh: Why ZAMAN IT is the Top Choice

In today’s rapidly evolving business landscape, effective communication systems are crucial for organizational success. For businesses in Bangladesh, the Private Automatic Branch Exchange (PABX) system is an essential component of their telecommunication infrastructure. This article delves into the PABX price in Bangladesh, exploring the factors that influence these costs and highlighting why ZAMAN IT stands out as the premier PABX solution provider in the region.

What is PABX?

Before diving into the PABX price in Bangladesh, it’s important to understand what PABX systems are. A PABX system is a private telephone network used within an organization. It allows employees to communicate with each other internally and make external phone calls, all while managing the communication flow efficiently.

Factors Influencing PABX Price in Bangladesh

Several factors influence the PABX price in Bangladesh. Understanding these factors can help businesses make informed decisions when purchasing a PABX system.

  1. System Size and Capacity: The size and capacity of the PABX system significantly impact its price. Larger systems with more extensions and advanced features will generally cost more. Businesses need to assess their requirements to determine the appropriate system size.

  2. Features and Functionality: PABX systems come with various features such as call forwarding, voicemail, and automated attendants. Systems with advanced functionalities will be priced higher. Choosing a system with the right features for your business needs is essential.

  3. Brand and Quality: The brand and quality of the PABX system play a crucial role in determining its price. Reputable brands known for reliability and performance may come at a premium but often offer better long-term value.

  4. Installation and Maintenance: The cost of installation and ongoing maintenance can affect the overall PABX price in Bangladesh. Some providers include these services in the initial cost, while others may charge separately.

  5. Scalability: Scalability refers to the system’s ability to grow with your business. Scalable PABX systems may have a higher initial cost but can be more cost-effective in the long run as they accommodate business growth.

  6. Technological Advancements: Modern PABX systems with VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) capabilities or cloud-based solutions may have different pricing compared to traditional analog systems. The integration of new technologies can influence the PABX price in Bangladesh.

PABX Price in Bangladesh Trends

The PABX price in Bangladesh varies depending on the factors mentioned above. On average, small to medium-sized business PABX systems may range from BDT 50,000 to BDT 200,000. Larger systems with extensive features and capabilities can exceed BDT 500,000.

  1. Entry-Level Systems: For small businesses or startups, entry-level PABX systems are available at lower prices, typically starting around BDT 50,000. These systems offer basic functionalities suitable for businesses with minimal communication needs.

  2. Mid-Range Systems: Mid-range PABX systems, priced between BDT 100,000 and BDT 300,000, provide a balance of features and capacity. These systems are ideal for growing businesses that require more advanced functionalities and better scalability.

  3. High-End Systems: High-end PABX systems, which can cost upwards of BDT 500,000, offer extensive features and capabilities. These systems are suitable for large enterprises with complex communication needs.

Why Choose ZAMAN IT for Your PABX Solution?

When it comes to selecting a PABX solution provider in Bangladesh, ZAMAN IT is a name that stands out. Here’s why ZAMAN IT is considered the best PABX solution provider in Bangladesh:

  1. Expertise and Experience: ZAMAN IT has years of experience in the field of telecommunication and PABX systems. Their expertise ensures that businesses receive top-notch solutions tailored to their specific needs.

  2. Comprehensive Solutions: ZAMAN IT offers a wide range of PABX systems catering to various business sizes and requirements. Whether you need an entry-level system or a high-end solution, ZAMAN IT has options that fit your budget and needs.

  3. Competitive Pricing: Understanding the importance of cost-effectiveness, ZAMAN IT provides competitive PABX prices in Bangladesh. They offer transparent pricing with no hidden costs, ensuring businesses get the best value for their investment.

  4. Quality and Reliability: ZAMAN IT is known for delivering high-quality PABX systems that are reliable and durable. Their systems are designed to perform consistently, minimizing downtime and ensuring smooth communication.

  5. Professional Installation and Support: ZAMAN IT offers professional installation services and comprehensive support for their PABX systems. Their team ensures that the system is set up correctly and provides ongoing support to address any issues that may arise.

  6. Customization and Scalability: ZAMAN IT understands that each business has unique needs. They offer customizable PABX solutions that can be scaled as your business grows, providing long-term value and flexibility.

  7. Customer-Centric Approach: ZAMAN IT places a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction. They work closely with clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions that meet their specific requirements.

How to Choose the Right PABX System

Choosing the right PABX system involves several considerations:

  1. Assess Your Needs: Determine the size of your business, the number of extensions required, and the features you need. This assessment will help you choose a system that fits your requirements and budget.

  2. Evaluate Features: Consider the functionalities offered by different PABX systems. Make sure the system you choose has the features that align with your business operations.

  3. Consider Future Growth: Choose a PABX system that can grow with your business. Scalability is crucial for accommodating future expansion without needing a complete system overhaul.

  4. Compare Prices: Compare the PABX prices in Bangladesh from different providers. Ensure that you’re getting a fair price for the features and quality offered.

  5. Check Reviews and References: Research the reputation of PABX solution providers. Customer reviews and references can provide insights into the reliability and performance of their systems.

  6. Look for Support and Maintenance: Ensure that the provider offers comprehensive support and maintenance services. This will help you address any issues promptly and keep your communication system running smoothly.

The PABX price in Bangladesh is influenced by various factors, including system size, features, brand, and installation costs. By understanding these factors, businesses can make informed decisions when purchasing a PABX system.

ZAMAN IT emerges as the best PABX solution provider in Bangladesh, offering a combination of expertise, competitive pricing, quality, and exceptional support. Their comprehensive range of solutions and customer-centric approach make them the ideal choice for businesses seeking reliable and efficient communication systems.

When considering a PABX system for your business, keep in mind the importance of choosing a provider that meets your specific needs and offers long-term value. With ZAMAN IT, you can be assured of a top-notch PABX solution that enhances your communication capabilities and supports your business growth.

For more information on PABX price in Bangladesh and how ZAMAN IT can assist you, contact their team of experts today. They are ready to help you find the perfect PABX solution that aligns with your business needs and budget.
